title: Higher risk weights on unsecured loans to hit co-lending portfolio: Report
description: Crisil predicts a slowdown in NBFCs' co-lending portfolios in FY'25, especially in unsecured lending, due to revised risk weights. While overall co-lending will grow, personal loan growth will moderate to 25-35% from 35% in FY'24. The focus is shifting towards MSME and home loans, driven by government initiatives
